scripts.docs: typedoc --out ../fs-pro-docs/website --ignoreCompilerErrors && cd ../fs-pro-docs && csso website/assets/css/main.css --output website/assets/css/main.css && git add . && git commit -a -m "new version" && git push origin master
scripts.build: webpack && node tools/rm && dts-bundle --configJson dts-bundle.json && rimraf types
scripts.git: git add . && git commit -a -m "new version" && git push origin master
scripts.cpublish: yarn build && yarn test && yarn lint dist/*.d.ts --fix && yarn docs && yarn publish
